title: Teemo got a stream? Yes... Check out this Teemo with a REAL Yordle-cam! DafuQ?

embed.description: Twitch is the world's leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 45 million gamers gather every month on Twitch to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitch's video platform is the backbone of both live and on-demand distribution for the entire video game ecosystem.

replies.body: Ahhh.. Ahhh... i know what you did there. Won't reveal your secret ;)

how does he create this?
its too smooth and awesome for a CGI live streaming
Hahahah loved it! Can I add you in game and play with you sometimes?

Hey there! In order to ensure that people can find player-created content more easily, we have the Player Creations sub-boards, linked below. It's best to post your YouTube videos and Twitch channels there, as to better keep things organised.
